anyOf.description:
header {key} [{value}]

When value is provided, match the request header with the given key and value pattern. Otherwise, match the request header when the given key exists.

query {key} [{value}]

When value is provided, match the request query with the given key and value pattern. Otherwise, match the request query when the given key exists.

cookie {key} [{value}]

When value is provided, match the request cookie with the given key and value pattern. Otherwise, match the request cookie when the given key exists.

form {key} [{value}]

When value is provided, match the request form with the given key and value pattern. Otherwise, match the request form when the given key exists.

post_form {key} [{value}]

When value is provided, match the request post form with the given key and value pattern. Otherwise, match the request post form when the given key exists.

host {host}

Match the request host with the given host pattern.

method {http_method}

Match the request method with the given method.

path {glob_pattern}

Match the request path with the given path pattern.

remote {ip|cidr}

Match the request remote address with the given IP or CIDR.

route {alias}

Match the request route with the given alias pattern.

basic_auth {username} {bcrypt_hashed_password}

Match the request basic authentication with the given username and bcrypt hashed password.

status {status_code} status {status_code}-{status_code} status {1|2|3|4|5}xx

Match the request status code with the given status code.

burst.description: Maximum number of requests allowed in a period
